game.description: Journey into the Eldervale to locate the ancient artifact of power.
game.objective: Find and recover the ancient artifact

tasks.description: Defeat the guards protecting the eldervale.
Find the hidden path to the artifact's location.
tasks.objective: Follow ancient runes for the path

tasks.description: Retrieve the artifact from its guarded location.
tasks.objective: Challenge the guardian and retrieve the artifact

game.title: Quest for the Eldervale Artifact
